This property makes armor slippery, as though it were coated with a thin film of oil. You gain a +1 item bonus to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) and [Squeeze](/Actions.aspx?ID=31).
